page.title: 04Four Oaks Industry
page.content: The vast majority of the people in employment work outside the area because industrial developmemt has never been a prominet feature. Manufacturing activity is seldom found anywhere. especially since the closure a few years ago of a large plastics factory in Stretly. What work there is is now almost entirely confined to small businesses emplpying a few people, the one exception is a medium sized factory associated with the car industry. The shoppong centres provide aome employment in the distributive industries as do the service industries which are concerned with urban conurbations everywhere.Public service industries involved with road and rail transport. i.e Delivery and maintainance are also apparent. There is some mixed farming in the North West of the area.
